name: mortshire
text: HE IS FIVE.

name: soticoto
text: ... Six?

name: jlynes
text:
NO.

FIVE.

name: baryonyx
text: Five he was, Five he is, and Five he is yet to be.

name: soticoto
text: Has Five been redefined?

name: pyro_ike
text: A comment left by pyro_ike was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by scottawesome, TwoRightFeet, mortshire, RedMange, hellsfruition, Shawgun, motts, Lapsarian)

name: bjorntd
text: A comment left by bjorntd was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by shrewbie, makeitathing, holly_golightly)

name: all-star951
text: I would give you a chubby except you have 5 chubbies and 5 lames, and I don't want to ruin it. PLEASE NO ONE RUIN THE BEAUTY.

name: phantomsword
text: It..It has been ruined...*sob*

name: engus
text: Don't fret, balance has been restored.

name: dissembly
text:
No, because you see there there are seven lames/chubbies, and the thing is, to quote a forebear, if I may be so bold:

HE IS FIVE.

name: galbraith
text: You confuse the predicate "is" with the "is" of equality.  Maybe English is not your native tongue.

name: soticoto
text: I've tongued a few English natives.

name: deus
text: Its stuff like this that makes the assetbar 100 times better then 4chan.

name: mangtastic
text:
Only 100? More like one hundred hundreds of times better. Than again, any negative integer multiplied by a positive one is will always be negative. What I am saying is that 4chan has a negative value for being better or worse than basically anything.

Also someone lamed you, I assume it is for even mentioning that place. I cannot say I completely disagree with them.

name: achtung
text: more like over 9000 times

name: tollschaft
text: This comment is not meant to sound aggressive, but have you ever been on 4chan for a serious length of time? If you get through all the spam and racism it can be a pretty great forum, in a similar way to assetbar

name: dartigen
text:
Yes, but the spam and racism and awful images make up 98% of 4chan.
4chan is maybe 2% great.
Assetbar is at the least >50% great because it does not have much spam and I do not see a lot of racism around here. There are some awful images but not as many as 4chan.
(The commonality is that both 4chan and Assetbar are full of people who spout memes constantly.)

name: soticoto
text:
Does not have much spam?
Assetbar is 90% spam at least.
Or would you like another "THESE KNIVES!" chain to prove the point?

name: mangtastic
text: Yes, I have, and I disagree.

name: tollschaft
text:
Let us agree to disagree then.
*doffs cap

name: saint
text:
you are fundamentally gone in the head.
you insult Phillipe, and Achewood will send you to Hell.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ..and then it's just a quick drive to Friendly's and their bathroom and FLOOSH! they're back.

name: soticoto
text: Those who do not understand Achewood will never understand the riddle in the menu... and instead are doomed to hang around out back with No-No for eternity.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: dag. you're right.

name: feetnotes
text: Surely not. Trouble-Man and No-No hang out in Heaven.

name: carlyle
text: And stare on as it just kinda burns down.

name: layzerblade
text: Well, just the one apartment building in Heaven.

name: draykid
rearadmiral
text: Both on fire.

name: carlyle
text: Well, you know, if you're into that kind of thing.

name: greenkoolayd
text: you must be retarded.....

name: lolsworth
text:
Why are you doing this

Why are you attacking a five year old child otter

WHAT MAKES YOUR HEART SO BLACK

name: dartigen
text:
Sometimes it is hard to tell if someone is gone in the head or just five. Philippe demonstrates this on a regular basis.
But five-year-olds are also possessed of a short attention span and an easily-fascinated nature. Phillipe also demonstrates this on a regular basis.
(what I am trying to say is that this is normal for five-year-olds, and probably normal for stuffed otters too)

name: saint
text: i don't know...beef made it pretty believable. when my mother was giving birth to me, my father tells me she screamed "oh god man this is so WAAAACKY!" too.

name: unclesma
text: Chubbied if only for the way you were born.

name: vweep
text: And all this time I thought you'd just congened in a gutter somewhere.

name: johnnyrocker
text: Congealed. See, that's the problem with quoting tv shows: sometimes you are an idiot.

name: cailetshadow
text: I like congened. It is the process by which genes, floating in the local atmosphere, tend to drift together and form a viable, if not particularly savory, organism.

name: achilleselbow
text: A comment left by achilleselbow was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, lamboyster, tttt2, NDCaesar, amandulence, RBisme, endstate, ravindra108, sid, clintisiceman)

name: selbencoirlo
text: Because the consensus is that Ultra Peanut is mistaken and quite possibly a bitch.

name: selbencoirlo
text: I very much had to increase my lame threshold just to see this. I increased it to 50 and then was surprised when it still didn't show up. I am pleased with going to this much trouble because now I get to contribute the 78th lame. Yayyyyyy!

name: vondicus
text: And with that, I ceremonially give your hundredth chubby. The circle is complete; you are officially the retard.

name: vondicus
text: I mean your hundredth lame. I have fallen upon my own sword.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Hoisted with your own  <strike>retard</strike>  petard?

name: andyk
text: my friends printed this strip out for me on my birthday... it holds special significance forevermore.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: A comment left by untilyouaresonude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Nurdbot, craigola, ohmygooses)

name: userbeliever
text:
what, No!
the christmas punch is the saddest thing.
http://m.assetbar.com/achewood/uuabrnRCw

name: dropkickpikachu
text: "OH GOD MAN THIS IS SO WAAAACKYYYYY" just slays me.

name: andrew_
text:
that, and when Roast Beef says, "oh crud man wish me luck"

I hope my wife says that to me before she goes into labor.

name: rad_chillies
text: I wish I could give you another chubby.  And please, please tell your wife to say that.  Also request "OH GOD MAN THIS IS SO WACKYYYY"

name: tangles
text: this strip makes me feel conflicted. i can't help but laugh, but i can't help but think that ray and beef would've scarred any normal five year old for life... especially because beef was a hermaphrodite. too much weirdness, but i can't look away

name: hyetal
text: Nah, the best line is Ray telling Beef, "You just went into labor!"  That this has to be pointed out to him is the... ...I can't think of a way to end this sentence.  I want to say something like "the bomb" only not so lame and tired.  But you know what I mean.

name: ford
text:
"freaking hilarious"

also, "goddamned awesome"

name: lux
text:
That's the goddamned awesome.

I thank you for this new bit of vernacular, ford!

name: waddlerz
text: No, the best line is Ray asking Philippe if its okay to for Roast Beef to have a baby in Ray's room

name: ted0phile
text: This.

name: never_die
text: It is sort of creepy how Ray asks if Philippe is okay with Beef giving birth in Ray's room.

name: jhunter
text: "I mean we could do it somewhere else if you're not cool with it"

name: tekende
text: He just wants the little guy to feel like he's part of the process.

name: ljuke
text: Roast Beef's face is priceless.

name: jesler729
text: Oh man look at that compassion in the last panel.

name: johnnyelectrifying
text: considering phillipe is five, that gift hit the nail on the head. well played.

name: relaxing
text: Who says good things never happen to the little shaver.

name: tombsgrave
text: Male pregnancy is also a fetish.

name: closefriend
text: A comment left by closefriend was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by phthoggos, Deusoma, 7th_shot)

name: someone3
text: A comment left by someone3 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by phthoggos, zulko, Zem, grayfox)

name: soticoto
text: Doug Winger.

name: trollcollins
text:
Sometimes I think everything conceivable is a fetish if you google hard enough.

Siiiiigh.

name: saru
text:
Including hot Google pr0n.
Don't believe me, [url=www.google.com]Google[/url] it. C'mon, Google it hard... SO hard.

name: killerlimpet
text: Yeah my high school content filter didn't cacth pr0n. Hilarious!

name: mega_panda
text: if I ever get married and have a kid it will only be on the condition that my wife describes birthing the child as "wacky."

name: 1000hz
text:
I got the Mickey Mouse Memory game as a birthday present when I was real young. Only, it wasn't my birthday, it was my older sister's birthday. I got a present for my sister having a birthday.

That is rad.

name: ging
text: When I was boy my brother once got a present on my birthday. 7 months later I demanded similar courtesy and was scolded, my parents apparently having completely forgotten their earlier transgression. This left a deep impression upon me.

name: philosophe
text: It must have, seeing as how you are now female.

name: soticoto
text: You were not the favourite child.

name: heccibiggs
text:
I don't know if it was intentional or not that you wrote "When I was boy" rather than "When I was a boy".

Either way, it made me read your entire comment in a Russian accent.

name: fuzzyshoo
text:
^This is a rad comment.

For rest of today, I read comments in theeck Russian accent. PRAVDA!

name: patiently56
text: This is the one that started it all for me.

name: letterswewrote
text: I love Ray and Beef for doing this. Particularly the idea of how they came up with this as a way to surprise Phillipe.

name: joeyramoney
text: this is how we do christmas at my house.

name: lereya
text: Fuck yes.

name: pitseleh
text: I concur!

name: tekende
text: Philippe concurs angrily.

name: lereya
text: Also, sorry for the double post, but Beef's face while watching Philippe's contentment makes my heart go all gooey.

name: phthoggos
text: Beef's :3 face always warms my cockles.

name: doomchild
text: My cockles are burning.

name: closefriend
text:
One time my ex-fiancee confided in me that she loves cats so much she wishes she could give birth to them instead of kids. I shit you not.

Guess what this strip reminds me of every time I read it!

name: zefiel
text: A comment left by zefiel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by alphagator, Andrew_, Direhaggis)

name: hyetal
text:
Kitten's got to have a collar, too, let's not forget that.

...

I'm sorry, I'll go take a cold shower now before I get further carried away.

name: tonyhighwind
text:
If made to choose, I would take the collar over the ears.

But not over the butt plug with a tail attached to the end.

name: art-vader
text: cats don't wear no butt plugs with tails. At least most cats don't...

name: art-vader
text: his woman all gnawing on a dead bird in bed...

name: alittlenothing
text: I would totally have kids if I could give birth to goats instead of humans. Cats..eh.

name: lux
text: ...goats?

name: tekende
text: A baby goat is called a kid.

name: drskradley
text: I, too, would rather have kittens instead of kids.  It's a bit weird, I'll grant you, but damn little kitties are cute.  Babies - sorry all you mothers out there, but they're a bit boring.

name: slalvation
text: Also, kittens are smaller.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: and you can leave them alone for most of the day and not get arrested.

name: tekende
text: And you can drop them and they'll be okay. Babies, not so much.

name: tekende
text: On the other hand, babies don't have claws...

name: awko
text: But they have those tiny razor-like nails.

name: spicyponyhead
text: But babies don't learn to use the litterbox for well over a year. Net win goes to kittens.

name: soticoto
text:
I've used up my Chubby Allotment... So I will grant you one in essence only...

Kittens FTW.
Who the heck would want a screaming human maggot when they could have a cute little mewing fluffball instead?

name: wonelove
text: the cake is a LIE

name: tonyhighwind
text:
Off the top of my head? People who are allergic to cats.

Oh, yeah, and people who want to propogate the species. If I raise one smart kid it cancels out one dumb kid, and the world moves that much closer to balance.

name: soticoto
text: Ideally, you'd also teach your smart kid to kill the dumb kid to complete the transition... otherwise you have the average of an average kid across two bodies, which just won't do.

name: deusoma
text: Also, distinctly unlike human young, I have never seen a picture of a living kitten that was not intensely adorable. With the singular and notable exception of the one that was born with one big eye like a cyclops.

name: heccibiggs
text:
This one?

[IMGS OFF]

noooooooooooooo

name: deusoma
text: Oh God. That's the one.

name: tinhand
text:
Is that real? Does the eye work?
...
I want one.

name: heccibiggs
text:
It is real, it's like a very rare deformity where something has one eye in place of where it's nose should be. No idea if the eye actually worked or not.

Note my use of the past tense... It died like a day and a half after it was born. Like, outrageously tragic, right?

name: deusoma
text: It does indeed fill me with an intense sadness.

name: tekende
text: It fills me with intense relief.

name: deusoma
text: I meant the poor thing's entire truncated existence, not the fact that it died. I wouldn't want it to live for the sole purpose of being alive, so in that I freely agree with you.

name: jonmw
text:
AUGH
UNMAKE IT

name: heccibiggs
text: Take it up with God.

name: skavid
text: Chubby for Cy the Cyclops Kitten. It's sad that it died a day and a half after it was born.

name: nicolae
text: I bet Phillipe was a little disappointed that it wasn't a baby.  A little.

name: jonnay
text:
The things they do for Philippe rock. I wish this happened to me on my birthday.

PS. Onstad rocks at drawing Philippe's innocent little emotions.

name: norrin
text: So would this be his 4th birthday? Or is it just assumed they are all his 5th?

name: dans
text: A comment left by dans was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by orvel, relaxing, sexualhomeboy)

name: sexualhomeboy
text: PHILLIPE IS FIVE.

name: sexualhomeboy
text: PHILIPPE IS FIVE WHETHER I CAN SPELL HIS NAME OR NOT.

name: joeyramoney
text: how is philippe retarded?

name: quinlaenar
text:
Oh god oh god your avatar is staring at me and asking that question... Um... You aren't. Every child marries flowers because a lying robot told them to.

*bursts into tears* I just couldn't do it, man...

name: thegrayhoodie
text:
Is SO good.
Is SO funny.

name: mindbnder
text: this is my favorite achewood strip.  those cats are so legitimate.  Also, will people stop calling Philippe retarded.  He's five and how fucking often do you need to be told that?

name: quantumcasaba
text:
And with this strip in particular, is a male cat giving birth to a board game really that much more ridiculous than a giant rabbit sneaking into one's house and hiding (of all things) eggs and candy all about?

Maybe it is.
:shrug:

name: soticoto
text: A comment left by soticoto was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by 7th_shot, Lumus, lux, kenyot, spicyponyhead)

name: cynthiamonster
text: "he's havin' his baby in my room. Are you okay with that?"

name: presterjohn
text: I suspect hell of jays were burned in the preparation of this scheme.

name: qingofchina
text: I don't think Philippe ever realized it was a ruse.

name: agentstinky
text: Roast Beef yelling "OH GOD MAN THIS IS SO WAAAACKYYYYY" is probably my favorite panel in all of Achewood.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Mr. Bear: Small clay statue.
Onstad: The day's work is done.

name: comrade_tom
text:
The hairnet is to prevent hairs infecting the memory machine.

Kermit is VERY PARTICULAR about this.

name: dybrar
text: He probably has a form letter to this extent.

name: direhaggis
text:
The birthday surprise is priceless.

I wonder why it wasn't Ray who got the giving birth gig. The gentleman clearly is packing hella cold pounds in the comparison to Roast Beef.

name: pogo
text: One night I dreamt I was giving birth, and woke up with a sleeping cat between my legs.

name: videocrime
text: this is the best way to get gifts, ever.

name: inthewater
text: This strip doesn't half tug on the heartstrings.

name: bpmead
text: I get the sense that this charade was more for Ray's and Beef's benefit than Phillippe's.

name: rowan
text: I love this one so much I laugh so hard every time I re-read it

name: bumpishound
text: IS IT CROWNING BEEF?

name: kikineko
text: Oh I hope Philippe knows that men still cannot bear children from this experience... or presents.

name: wonelove
text: I am doing this for a friend sometime.

name: skavid
text: Philippe's Birthday is the day after mine! We should totally have a joint birthday party one time!

name: mundane
text: Has there ever been a birthday where they don't fuck with the little guy in some way? i mean jesus and damn, when this kid turns five he's gonna have such a warped sense of reality.
